refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This is an expensive way to copy a GIF from stdin to stdout. The source is included as a skeleton for more sophisticated filters using DGifSlurp() and EGifSpew(). See the source in the util directory of the distribution for details.
Retains some utility as a test of DGifSlurp() and EGifSpew(). The output should be bytewise identical to the input.
